details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إنا نجعلك في نحورهم، ونعوذ بك من شرورهم
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنَّا نَجْعَلُكَ فِيْ نُحُوْرِهِم، وَنَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شُرُوْرِهِمْ
details.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innaa naj'aluka fee nuhoorihim wa na'oo<u>th</u>u bika min shuroorihim.
details.translations: O Allah, we ask You to restrain them by their necks and we seek refuge in You from their evil.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 2/89, and Al-Hakim graded it authentic and Ath-Thahabi agreed 2/142

pageTitle: Upon encountering an enemy or those of authority #1
